Articles.Content: I've never done it but i added up the delta v and have a lander and tug in orbit and im about to explore it for the first time, i never actually have seen any videos of anyone landing on Moho so it's even more interesting. No real point in this thread other than that, I'm trying to be more active in the community and all that jazz

There is an old thread

IMO going to Moho isn't so hard. I did a manned Moho landing and return only chemical engines and it still comes under 50t at LKO.

Edited July 23, 2019 by TheFlyingKerman

Tempted to just throw my Duna Done Quick at it and improvise. The question is whether I have enough Delta-V in the lander or would I need to pull some shenanigans with the transfer stage deorbitting or partially deorbiting...

It looks like starting immediately after my Duna mission, I can get there and back pretty easily before year 2  day 110, but I have to at least pay lip service to the idea that maybe launch windows matter.

Or... I could make another save for Moho Done Quick with the same rocket.

Edited July 24, 2019 by Pds314

Sounds good.  I have been meaning to do another Mohole decent.  

All Moho missions for me have had massive deltaV issues, I will need to overbuild this one.

Good luck for your endeavour !

I did that a while ago (sorry I didn't realize how even darker YT would re-encode it )
